Opening of the History of OpenAI.description: An overview of the presentation focusing on the historical background and evolution of OpenAI.

Key Developments in OpenAI.description: A detailed look at the foundational aspects, initial funding, partnerships, and the development of key technologies such as Transformers and the GPT series.

Ethics and Future Directions of OpenAI.description: Exploration of OpenAI's strategic business model shift, ethical challenges, and partnerships, along with its recent achievements and future aspirations.
